comment: Easiest GPA booster ever, hardest class to attend ever. Took this class as a study hour instead for the attendance. Attendance isn't mandatory but three consecutive misses is a penalty.

Professor B is a really good professor. He has a lot of repetition in his lectures, but he does that so that you can remember what is required for the assignment and the due date. He is a very lenient grader. As long as you turn something in on time, he will give you a good grade for it.

Professor B gives lectures every session, but he repeats himself because that's his teaching style. He gives very straightforward assignments and gives a detailed sheet of what he expects from you. As long as you turn your work in on time, you get a 100
